_comment_model_name: A unique name for your model/config. Used as the config filename.
_comment_scale: The scale factor between HQ and LQ images (e.g., 2, 4).
_comment_hq_path: Absolute or relative path to the High-Quality (HQ) image folder.
_comment_lq_path: Absolute or relative path to the Low-Quality (LQ) image folder.
_comment_yml_path: Path to the traiNNer-redux .yml config file for model training.
_comment_hcl_path: Path to the wtp_dataset_destroyer .hcl config file for dataset destruction/processing.
_comment_min_lq_w: Minimum width (in pixels) for LQ images. Images below this will be flagged/filtered.
_comment_min_lq_h: Minimum height (in pixels) for LQ images. Images below this will be flagged/filtered.
_comment_val_hq_path: (Optional) Path to validation HQ dataset, if available.
_comment_val_lq_path: (Optional) Path to validation LQ dataset, if available.
_comment_model_dir: (Optional) Path to the traiNNer-redux experiment directory for this model.
_comment_model_files: (Optional) List of model checkpoint files (e.g., .safetensors) for upscaling or inference.
_comment_hcl_input: (Optional) Input path as parsed from .hcl config, if available.
_comment_hcl_output: (Optional) Output path as parsed from .hcl config, if available.
_comment_hcl_global: (Optional) Global settings parsed from .hcl config, if available.
